name: Hidden Object Pirate Odyssey Dangerous Adventures
name_original: Hidden Object Pirate Odyssey Dangerous Adventures
description:
Once old Pirate having drunk in a tavern a few of rum, has shown to several pirates a card on which its treasures are hidden. All pirates of Red sea chase Pirate treasures now. Help Pirate to protect its treasures.

Features:-
--------------
-> 30 Different theme game play for hidden objects!
-> each Theme has total 25 mind testing levels!
-> total 26 Mind testing levels for game play!
-> cool background sound and effects!

How to play:-
----------------
-> you have to find the hidden objects from pirate's backgrounds and haunted room backgrounds as early as possible within minimum time!
-> hint option available for your help,but use it carefully it deducts your coins!
-> every level completed you got a star! so play fair and fast to get 3 stars!
-> game centre leader boards to compete with friends & family!

available as universal app for iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch!

lets download for free and get it today for fun!

if u like it! please rate it!
